title: Player reporting
body:
Hey guys.

This is my first time posting here. Where does this get reported? (Look in the chat box) or am I in the right place?
Fiora was also trash talking as well.

Thanks in advance! :) 

~ShockerBlade~

replies.body:
Do not post information about other summoners and stating that they've done reportable behaviour; it's against the universal rules to do that. You should instead just report the player, and if you're in a situation where you can't do that (because you've left the post-game lobby for some reason) then you can create a support ticket about it.

Best of luck.
